History
-------

++++++++++++++++++

* Use Cython instead of manual C code to support Python 3

++++++++++++++++++

* Release after fixing refactoring code base, available now on new PyPi server

0.1.0 (2013-11-01)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
